revision.text: Possibly: A course of lectures on the principal subjects in pneumatology, ethics, and divinity: with references to the most considerable authors on each subject. By the late Reverend Philip Doddridge, D.D. 2nd ed. (London : Printed by assignment from the author's widow, For J. Buckland, J. F. and C. Rivington, W. Clarke and R. Collins, S. Crowder, T. Longman, B. Law, E. Johnston, G. Robinson, R. Baldwin, and W. Otridge, MDCCLXXVI [1776]). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2405984~S1
